name: ShoutMediaRadio
0:
”Alexa, open shout media radio”
”Alexa, start shout media radio”
”Alexa, play shout media radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shout media radio
des:
Shout Media Radio is an independent artist music radio station dedicated to supporting and promoting independent artists. We strive to provide a platform where talented artists can showcase their music and connect with a wider audience. Our station is committed to curating the best independent music from various genres, ensuring that listeners have access to a diverse range of musical talent. By tuning in to Shout Media Radio, you'll not only discover new and exciting artists but also contribute to the growth and recognition of independent music. Join us in celebrating the creativity and passion of independent artists, and let their music resonate with you like never before.

www.shoutmediaradio.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
